name: Spacer Jet - Space Games Team
description:
Tired of work? Need a diversion? What can be better than playing Spacer Jet!

A game that will take away all your worries and give you a chance to relax your tired mind. Spacer Jet is a game in which you can enjoy HD graphics with much engaging gameplay. Pass obstacles and travel as far as you can to make as many points as you want. Earning these points will help you unlock better space jets to fly in. Requires a little concentration because if you don’t look at your screen, you might crash your only space jet. The game is all about easing your stress as it takes you to another world for a while. Now who doesn’t like giving a visit to outer space... no?!

Highlights of Spacer Jet:
• HD graphics you cannot ignore; the fantastic quality gives you the feel of 3D.
• Earn coins by playing more to unlock space jets with cool effects and colors.
• For people who love to pass obstacles and helps in improving your concentration.
• With incredible sound effects try not to crash because nobody likes the sound of it.

This game is for everybody you can play while sitting at work to take a break from whatever is bothering you. If you are a student exhausted from studying too much, pause it for a while, take a deep breath, and start playing Spacer Jet.

Give us your feedback and suggestions. Also, don’t forget to leave a rating and a review!
